description.en: Classic Omelette - a classic asia dish.
description.zh: Classic Omelette - a classic asia dish.
description.sv: Classic Omelette - a classic asia dish.

en: 3 pcs egg
30 ml milk
15 g butter
zh: 3 pcs 鸡蛋
30 ml 牛奶
15 g 黄油
sv: 3 pcs ägg
30 ml mjölk
15 g smör

en: Prepare the main ingredients: egg, milk, butter.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of lemon.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: 鸡蛋, 牛奶, 黄油.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of 柠檬.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
sv: Prepare the main ingredients: ägg, mjölk, smör.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of citron.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

en: 4 pcs egg
400 g tomato
1 pc onion
zh: 4 pcs 鸡蛋
400 g 番茄
1 pc 洋葱
sv: 4 pcs ägg
400 g tomat
1 pc lök

en: Prepare the main ingredients: egg, tomato, onion.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Rest the cooked dish for a few minutes before serving.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
zh: Prepare the main ingredients: 鸡蛋, 番茄, 洋葱.

Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
sv: Prepare the main ingredients: ägg, tomat, lök.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Rest the cooked dish for a few minutes before serving.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

dish_name.zh: 鸡蛋 炸/炒 米饭

description.en: Egg Fried Rice - a classic middle east dish.
description.zh: 鸡蛋 炸/炒 米饭 - a classic middle east dish.
description.sv: ägg Stekt ris - a classic middle east dish.

en: 2 pcs egg
200 g rice
50 g vegetables
zh: 2 pcs 鸡蛋
200 g 米饭
50 g vegetables
sv: 2 pcs ägg
200 g ris
50 g vegetables

en: Prepare the main ingredients: egg, rice, vegetables.
Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of lemon.
Cook using appropriate method (grill, sauté, bake, or simmer) until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.

description.zh: 鸡蛋s Benedict - a classic mediterranean dish.

50 g cheese
30 ml milk

50 g 奶酪
30 ml 牛奶
sv: 4 pcs ägg
50 g ost

Season or marinate as needed for flavor.
Garnish with fresh herbs and a squeeze of lemon.

Adjust seasoning and serve hot with preferred sides.
